title: The Reward - My Big Brother's Wife Book 1
description: Hot damn, my big brother’s wife is a beauty.I’ve had hots for Angela ever since I first saw her. And now that big bro’s on a business trip, I can have her all to myself… I wish. There’s no way a married woman like her would ever look that way at a guy 10 years younger than her. I guess I’ll just have to settle for fantasies. Unless she’s not as decent as I think?"The Reward" is the first book in "My Big Brother's Wife" series which starts from cheating and slowly evolves into cuckold. If you like short and hot erotica stories that are straight to the point, this series is for you.
author: Marc Everharden
